DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study find whether patient receive spinal anesthesia contain lidocaine sufentanil get transient neurological symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Spinal Anesthesia Using Lidocaine Sufentanil ( Transient Neurological Symptoms ) TNS
DOC.criteria: adult age eighteen year patient refuse spinal anesthesia spinal anesthesia contraindicate pregnancy patient incapable give consent diabetes neurological disorder chronic pain chronic use analgesic spinal anesthesia within five day actual surgery
